subject: Re: Little Princess!
author: psi_research
full_text:
Is that why her leg is in a cast? Poor pup. I miss my dog Benny, my
best friend for 16 years. I know a lot of people attempt to make evp
recordings of their departed pets but I can't bear to try that.
-Bill
--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
>
> 
>  I carried this dog around all day, she only weighs 3 or 4 pounds.
she's the one that fell off that bed last night. I think my guys were
concerned about her bonding to me too much---to late!
>  
>  Frank-S
